title: Aromatherapy
author: Admin
description: Aromatherapy Aromatherapy is the practice of using natural oils to enhance psychological and physical well-being. NHC's aromatherapy department carries only high-quality essential and carrier oils. We're excited about our exclusive Natural Health Center line of essential oils. They are made from the most fragrant part of the plant including flower, bark, root, or rind. .

They are made from the most fragrant part of the plant including flower, bark, root, or rind. . We offer diffusers for your home, office or car, necklaces, and bracelets.
